metadata.title: CVE-2021-47398 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/hfi1: Fix kernel pointer leak Pointers should be printed with %p or%px rather than cast to 'unsigned long long' and printed with %llx. Change%llx to %p to print the secured pointer.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
